body.title: Create a Sum Function
body.description: Write a function that adds two numbers together
body.instructions:
Create a function called 'sum' that takes two parameters (a and b) and returns their sum.

Example:
sum(2, 3) should return 5
sum(-1, 1) should return 0
body.explanation: The sum function uses the addition operator (+) to add two numbers and return the result.
